title: Book Cover, "Bookjacket by Alvin Lustig for "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald,  New Directions Books", 1947
medium: Lithography in yellow and black ink on white shiny wove paper
signed: Signed in printed black ink, front cover lower right: lustig.
inscribed:
Printed vertically in black ink, spine: THE GREAT GATSBY, printed vertically in grary ink, spine: F.SCOTT FITZGERALD. Printed horizontally in black ink, spine lower margin within white square: NC 9. 

Printed in black ink, front cover upper center right: F. scott Fitzgerald. Printed in white ink, front cover center: the great. Printed in black and white ink, front cover center right: GATSBY.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Design on bright yellow ground.Cover is largely filled with black serif dollar sign ($) in the center. The letters of the the word Gatsby are inside alternating white and grey boxes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "Bookjacket by Alvin Lustig for "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald,  New Directions Books", 1947.
1947. Lithography in yellow and black ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-165-5.
